author: elecharny
msg: o Added a test in MoveReferralITTest (@Igored atm) for DIRSERVER-1518
o Changed an error name to be more explicit
o The move() method in store which takes a RDN parameter has been renamed moveAndRename
o The Move() operation can now take an Entry parameter to make the operation atomic (not yet implemented)
o Added some missing Javadoc
o Reviewed the move() operation, which now does nothing but a move
o Fixing tests accordingly to the changes

author: hindessm
msg: Merge changes from trunk@953280.  (Note this is a metadata only merge since
the r953280 commit is equivalent to the existing r953307 commit on this
branch.)

author: jorton
msg: Run filter "init" functions exactly once per request.  No longer run
init functions for connection filters (doing an "init" once per
handler invocation makes no sense for a connection filter).  No longer
run init functions multiple times per request if a subrequest is used.
* include/util_filter.h (ap_filter_rec_t): Clarify use of the init
function pointer.
* server/config.c (invoke_filter_init): Drop ap_ prefix for private
function; take a request_rec pointer and only invoke filters with
matching request.
(ap_invoke_handler): Adjust accordingly.
Reviewed by: rpluem
